name: Game Studio Simulator（我要做游戏）
description: Make a Game Company for your self！Get it work，Run for Rich！
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: AMD Athlon X4 5350, Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M, Radeon HD 6790 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: AMD Athlon X4 605e, Intel Celeron G1610 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7850, GeForce GTX 470 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
